[DevOps CommentId:11386255]

On Escalation Ticket # 00429338 the new comment has been added: The customer mentioned if it would take time for the image to be created he would be willing to give us access to the current image to make changes.

On Escalation Ticket # 00429338 the new comment has been added: Bogdan Melinte:

@Cristian-Alexandru Halmajan we can modify it to start but the moment that they modify the networking settings or do a certificate regeneration this will break again. If they want a permanent fix, this is a feature request, rather than a support request. 
Also, as a side note, we are being asked to modify the usual operational flow of our appliance just to cater to the customers specific env

[DevOps CommentId:11398492]

On Escalation Ticket # 00429338 the new comment has been added: Cristian-Alexandru Halmajan:

Thank you @Bogdan Melinte

[DevOps CommentId:11398720]

On Escalation Ticket # 00429338 the Following Fields have been updated: 
Status has been changed to Awaiting Escalating Engineer.

On Escalation Ticket # 00429338 the new comment has been added: Cristian-Alexandru Halmajan:

Hi Andrei,

Please see below the feedback from DevOps:
"We can modify it to start but the moment that they modify the networking settings or do a certificate regeneration this will break again. If they want a permanent fix, this is a feature request, rather than a support request.
Also, as a side note, we are being asked to modify the usual operational flow of our appliance just to cater to the customers specific environment."


Based on this, please raise a feature request on the Product Board.

Thank you,
Cristi

cc: @Krzysztof Staszalek,

@WaitingOnEngineer
